remarks: Left-subtraction:  Subtraction of the left summand from the result of an addition.  (Contributed by BJ, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
addlsub.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
addlsub.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
addlsub.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
addlsub $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) = C <-> A = ( C - B ) ) ) $.
